description: Unique identifier for each Drug Era record.
comment: Primary Key for the DRUG_ERA table.

description: Identifier of the Person to whom the Drug Era applies.
Concept identifier representing the drug ingredient. Must conform to concept class 'Ingredient'.
comment: Foreign Key: CONCEPT.concept_id (Domain: Drug; Concept Class: Ingredient).

description: Start date of the Drug Era. Defined as the start date of the first Drug Exposure for a given ingredient, allowing a maximum 30-day persistence window between exposures.
comment: Start date of continuous drug exposure era.

description: End date of the Drug Era. Defined as the end date of the last Drug Exposure, inferred using days_supply or administration rules. A standard 30-day persistence window is applied between exposures.
comment: End date of continuous drug exposure era.

description: Number of DRUG_EXPOSURE records grouped into this Drug Era.
Total number of drug-free days between Drug Exposure events contributing to the Drug Era, assuming no stockpiling.
comment: Sum of actual gap days within the era.
